summary: Tarantha Uebele is a Home Health Clinical Analyst and Instructional Designer with over 28 years' experience in home health and hospice and 5 years with the Epic Home Health application. She possesses expertise in designing, building, implementing, and supporting the Home Health and Hospice application, as well as an array of Epic functionalities.
work_experience: Tarantha has over 28 years of experience in home health and hospice, including 5 years with the Epic Home Health application. She served as Business Analyst, Principal Trainer, and Application Coordinator during an end-to-end implementation and system updates for ProHealth Care. As an analyst consultant for Providence Health & Services, she led a Community Connect Home Health implementation project. At Northwest Community Hospital, she was a build analyst on the Home Health team, focusing on validation, workflow design, build, testing, and clinical break-out sessions. At Lahey Health, she served as an Instructional Designer, leading training environment and materials build, and providing classroom instruction for an integrated implementation, including go-live support and system updates.
